thread.title: Allied Telesis Wins Second iCMG Architecture Award

author: admin
title: Allied Telesis Wins Second iCMG Architecture Award
text:
Allied Telesis, Inc. 
SINGAPORE -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Allied Telesis, a recognized innovator of smart technologies for an information-driven world, has again been honored at the annual iCMG Architecture Excellence Awards—this time for its innovative Secure Enterprise SDN Solution. 
Although SDN has been of interest to both cloud and managed service providers for some time, its relevance to the Enterprise market has been unclear. The Allied Telesis Secure Enterprise SDN Solution takes the underlying SDN technology built into many Allied Telesis products, and combines it with applications from partner vendors. This creates a comprehensive solution that can solve the challenges experienced by Enterprise organizations today. 
Last year, the Company was awarded for its innovative network management tool, Allied Telesis Management Framework™ (AMF). AMF is a framework, or architecture, that provides a simplified approach to network management. AMF automates many common network tasks, freeing up valuable IT resources and leading to an overall reduced Total Cost of Ownership (TCO). 
This year’s award-winning Secure Enterprise SDN Solution represents yet another commitment by Allied Telesis to delivering innovations that bring proven benefits to customers in the Enterprise networking sector. The Company is considerably ahead of other vendors in bringing a truly commercial SDN solution to the Enterprise market. 
The competition jury was impressed by the capabilities of the Secure Enterprise SDN Solution, as well as the forward-looking business architecture that underlies it. They awarded it first place in the “Future IT” category, ahead of entries from other well-known international organizations, thus demonstrating the leadership Allied Telesis is taking when it comes to SDN. 
Mr. Seiichiro Sato, Global Product Marketing Director at Allied Telesis, said, “Network management is an area where many organizations face challenges. Being awarded, not once but twice, for our technologies that assist with network management and orchestration, really highlights the fact that Allied Telesis is a genuine innovator and leader in this arena.” 
Allied Telesis is a member of the Open Network Foundation (ONF), a user-driven organization that is dedicated to the promotion and adoption of SDN via the development of open standards. 
For further information about the Allied Telesis Secure Enterprise SDN Solution, or to learn more about how Allied Telesis can assist your organization, please visit alliedtelesis.com or contact your local Allied Telesis representative. 
About the iCMG Architecture Awards of Excellence 
iCMG is a leading full-service Enterprise & IT Architecture firm, and a pioneer in its field. In the last 12 years, they have helped a wide variety of clients—over 20 domains—across 32 countries, to manage their complexity and contradictions in order to achieve growth. 
iCMG Architecture Awards of Excellence are given to companies who have successfully used architecture in achieving their business goals. There are 21 award categories for which nominations are invited every year. 
The purpose of the awards is to honor architects and enterprises whose work demonstrates a combination of talent, vision and workmanship, to create successful and enduring systems and enterprises. More information can be found online at http://live.icmgworld.com/ . 
About Allied Telesis, Inc. 
For nearly 30 years, Allied Telesis has been delivering reliable, intelligent connectivity for everything from enterprise organizations to complex, critical infrastructure projects around the globe. 
In a world moving towards Smart Cities and the Internet of Things, networks must evolve rapidly to meet new challenges. Allied Telesis smart technologies, such as Allied Telesis Management Framework™ (AMF) and Enterprise SDN, ensure that network evolution can keep pace, and deliver efficient and secure solutions for people, organizations and “things” - both now and into the future. 
Allied Telesis is recognized for innovating the way in which services and applications are delivered and managed, resulting in increased value and lower operating costs. Visit us online at alliedtelesis.com.
